bio: This nighttime nuisance loves staying up late. Have a friend who won't go to bed? It's probably this Yo-kai's fault.

soultimate.name: Worn Out
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 40% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' defense is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Attack up by 15% during night missions.
skill.name: Night Life

name: Wydeawake
